name: Imprism
description:
The imps are running amok! You need to get them back into their cages but they’re savage little beasts. Maybe your master’s polymorph wand can help but you’re running out of time! Worse yet if you summon too many dragons you’ll be RUNNING OUT OF SPACE!

Programmers: Luke Ledwich, Zhiming Chen Designer: James Carlton Artists: Jemima Gulliver Steven Grech
